description: PT Bestprofit Futures ("BPF") is an officially licensed futures brokerage company registered with the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency (BAPPEBTI) since 2004. A member of the Jakarta Futures Exchange (JFX) and Indonesia Clearing House (KBI - Persero), PT Bestprofit Futures operates 12 offices across Indonesia, including: Jakarta (2 offices), Bandung, Semarang, Surabaya, Malang, Medan, Banjarmasin, Pontianak, Jambi, Pekanbaru, and Bandar Lampung.

legal.title: Legal & Membership
items: Registered and supervised by BAPPEBTI since 2004
Member of Indonesia Clearing House (KBI - Persero)
